original: @343b # // yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshugs su bcad pa /

analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gang la ser sna rnam chags pa //
analyzed: gang la ser sna rnam chags pa //
translated: To those who are attached to stinginess,

analyzed: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
translated: he will bring you auspiciousness.

original: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur ;

original: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
translated: he will bring you auspiciousness.

analyzed: gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi //
translated: He who, in the course of cyclic existence,

original: legs mdzad par 'gyur //
analyzed: legs mdzad par 'gyur //

original: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
translated: He will bring you well-being.

original: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //

translated: He will bring you well-being.

original: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni //

analyzed: tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de //

original: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur //
translated: He will bring you well-being.

original: bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur @344b cig / thams cad nad ni med gyur cig / kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig / gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing //
analyzed: bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur @344b cig / thams cad nad ni med gyur cig / kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig / gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing //
translated: Whatever spirits have come here,
